moves.1. d4: I have a hard opponent in this game and I learned well his play before I moved 1. d4
moves.1... d5: I expected exactly 1. ... d5 and Slav defence
moves.3. Nf3 Nf6 4. Nc3 g6: and we are in to the game. Here I expected 4. ... e6 instead of g6 and probably e6 would have been a better move.
moves.5... cxd5 6. Qb3: 6. Qd3 is not bad here I guess
moves.7... a6 8. e3 O-O 9. h3: and we have a standard position. 9. h3 allows safe retreat for the black bishop (f4)
moves.9... Nc6: all black moves are predictable now
moves.13. b3: 13. b3! - now c4 is secured against the black knight
moves.13... Bb7 14. Rac1 Rc8 15. Qd2 Nc6: what else to do - back to the centre, back to the game
moves.18. Rfe1: white are ready for the battle
moves.19. Nxb5: 19. Nxd5 !! absolutely unexpected for the black
moves.21... Nd7 22. Bxd7 Qxd7 23. Rc7: black found the only way for defence
moves.27... Qe2: but black declined most probably expecting queens exchange and a complicated game
moves.28... Rb8: and mistake - first fatal mistake. It was better here 28. ... Qxf2 29. Qxa6 and a complicated position a bit better for the white.
moves.29. Rxf7+: 29. Rxf7!! for sure ! the other way was 29. Qxe6! also not bad I guess
moves.29... Kxf7 30. Qc7+ Kf6: and that was the second fatal mistake. It was better here 30. ... Ke8 or Kf8 but not Kf6 ??
moves.31. Qxb8 Bd3: and the last mistake - no time for attack. Mate in 4 :)
